title: The Median of Sierpinski Triangle Graphs
authors:
Kannan Balakrishnan, Manoj Changat, M V. Dhanyamol, Andreas M. Hinz,
  Hrishik Koley, Divya Sindhu Lekha
abstract:
The median $M$ of a graph $G$ is the set of vertices with a minimum total
distance to all other vertices in the graph. In this paper, we determine the
median of Sierpi\'{n}ski triangle graphs. Sierpi\'{n}ski triangle graphs, also
known as Sierpi\'{n}ski gasket graphs of order $n$ are graphs formed by
contracting all non-clique edges from the Sierpi\'{n}ski graphs of order
($n+1$).
